string.name: motivating_oneliner
string.comment:
IMPORTANT NOTICE:
This list is not meant to be translated directly line by line. Just some random memorable lines that are understood by user to create a lighthearted easy mood.
It can be memes, movie quotes, game quotes, famous words, jokes, etc, easily understandable by a native speaker. This may differ in different countries and in different languages.
They should not be offensive and should not put anyone in bad mood.
The interface picks a random line out of this block and presents it to the user. On Android you can see it after pressing the + button, on web - after clicking several times on text input field in chat.
Lines should not be too long, ideally no longer than 30 symbols.
